generic_ideological_fanaticism_category = {
	generic_expand_recruiting_station_1 = {
		icon = eng_propaganda_campaigns
		highlight_states = { state = 1 }
		available = {
			1 = {
				is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
				state_population > 1000
			}
		}
		visible = {
			1 = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { recruiting_station_var_level = 6 } }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		cost = 50
		days_remove = 21
		remove_effect = {
			1 = { generic_expand_recruiting_station_effect = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = generic_expand_recruiting_station_tt
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = { factor = 2 1 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 1 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 1 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 5 1 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 6 1 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 7 1 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 8 1 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 9 1 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 10 1 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0 1 = { state_population < 10000 } }
		}
	}

		highlight_states = { state = 627 }
		available = {
			627 = {
				is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
				state_population > 1000
			}
		}
		visible = {
			627 = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { recruiting_station_var_level = 6 } }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		cost = 50
		days_remove = 21
		remove_effect = {
			627 = { generic_expand_recruiting_station_effect = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = generic_expand_recruiting_station_tt
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = { factor = 2 627 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 627 = { distance_to = { value < 800 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 627 = { distance_to = { value < 700 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 5 627 = { distance_to = { value < 600 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 6 627 = { distance_to = { value < 500 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 7 627 = { distance_to = { value < 400 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 8 627 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 9 627 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 10 627 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0 627 = { state_population < 10000 } }
		}
	}

			modifier = { factor = 8 1101 = { distance_to = { value < 300 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 9 1101 = { distance_to = { value < 200 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 10 1101 = { distance_to = { value < 100 target = capital } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0 1101 = { state_population < 10000 } }
		}
	}
	generic_expand_recruiting_station_1102 = {
		icon = eng_propaganda_campaigns
		highlight_states = { state = 1102 }
		available = {
			1102 = {
				is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT
				state_population > 1000
			}
		}
		visible = {
			1102 = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { recruiting_station_var_level = 6 } }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		cost = 50
		days_remove = 21
		remove_effect = {
			1102 = { generic_expand_recruiting_station_effect = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = generic_expand_recruiting_station_tt
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = { factor = 2 1102 = { distance_to = { value < 900 target = capital } } }
